content: क्षत्रः, --त्रं {@--1@} Dominion, power, supremacy, might. {@--2@} A man of the Kṣatriya caste, or the Kṣatriya tribe taken collectively; क्षतात्किल त्रायत इत्युदग्रः क्षत्रस्य शब्दो भुवनेषु रूढः <ls>R. 2. 53</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 69</ls>, <ls n="R. 11.">71</ls>; असंशयं क्षत्रपरिग्रहक्षमा <ls>Ś. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 322.</ls> {@--3@} A man of the warrior class, a soldier; क्षत्रप्रताप <ls>U. 6. 18</ls> martial or heroic valour; <ls n="U.">6. 16.</ls> --त्री {@--1@} A woman of the military caste. {@--2@} The rank of a member of the military caste. {@--3@} Wealth. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} The body.

क्षत्रः, --त्रं {@--1@} Dominion, power, supremacy, might. {@--2@} A man of the Kṣatriya caste, or the Kṣatriya tribe taken collectively; क्षतात्किल त्रायत इत्युदग्रः क्षत्रस्य शब्दो भुवनेषु रूढः <ls>R. 2. 53</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 69</ls>, <ls n="R. 11.">71</ls>; असंशयं क्षत्रपरिग्रहक्षमा <ls>Ś. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 322.</ls> {@--3@} A man of the warrior class, a soldier; क्षत्रप्रताप <ls>U. 6. 18</ls> martial or heroic valour; <ls n="U.">6. 16.</ls> --त्री {@--1@} A woman of the military caste. {@--2@} The rank of a member of the military caste. {@--3@} Wealth. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} The body.
